cast.overview: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.
cast.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3

details.biography: Brett Tutor was born and raised in Austin, Texas. Getting his start in the entertainment business as a stunt man, he would soon end up working as a survival specialist for the Discovery Channel and as a carpenter for TLC and HGTV. He now focuses full time on film acting and writing and recording music.
details.name: Brett Tutor
